text: all right so I've been working the last
three days I heart I mean at the route
91 Music Festival and they let us off a
little bit early today so that we could
see the last performer and so I had
called my girlfriend to come and meet me
there so that she could get into and we
could both watch the last performer and
so we made our way into like the middle
of the crowd pretty close to the stage
and so on about the third song we just
hear like this noise it sounds like
fireworks
a couple random pops going off and
everybody just kind of like looked
around but they just thought it was
fireworks and the performer kept going
and then it went off again and like like
10 seconds later it went off again
and you see the performers run off the
stage the whole stage goes black and
then people are saying get down get down
that's when we knew it was obviously a
shooter and we're all on the ground we
can't see anything it's dark we just all
we hear is gunshots going off and he
keeps going and then it's AA sermon and
somebody says he's reloading run and
everybody just gets up and starts
running and you see people just getting
trampled and there's people on the
ground I was looking on the ground
people are bloody everywhere I saw a
girl her whole face was bloody her old
chest was bloody people pushing over
those rails burning their hands on
grills trying to get through because
there's barbecues everywhere there's
older Lee it was crazy and we make it
out we make it out and we run toward the
Tropicana Hotel which is right next door
she's right next to her we get inside
and then we're trying to figure out like
a way to get out where to go and then we
hear somebody yell the shooters in here
and then everybody starts running out of
there
